uk.ac.ed.inf.nmr.mapreduce
Class NestedMapper<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
      uk.ac.ed.inf.nmr.mapreduce.NestedMapper<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
Type Parameters:
KEYIN - the type of the keys that get generated by the RecordReader from an input split.
VALUEIN - the type of the values that get generated by the RecordReader from an input split.
KEYOUT - the type of the keys that will exit the NestedMapper function.
VALUEOUT - the type of the values that will exit the NestedMapper function.
public class NestedMapper<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>

Class extending the Mapper class in Hadoop and enabling it to start a nested job.

Author:
Daniel Stanoescu
